name: Home for New Year
description:
You are a 25-year-old unmarried Chinese girl working on your Ph.D degree. You return to your dad's hometown for New Year celebration, but everyone wants you to get married.

Do you tell the relatives to mind their own business or try to maintain that facade of a loving family?

Content warning: misogyny, mentioned homophobia and traditional gender roles, reproduction pressure.

One playthrough is about 5 min long.
